com.facebook.shimmer

Annotation Type Shimmer.Shape


  • @Retention(value=SOURCE)
public static @interface Shimmer.Shape
    The shape of the shimmer's highlight. By default LINEAR is used.

    • Field Detail

      • LINEAR

        public static final int LINEAR
        Linear gives a ray reflection effect.

      • RADIAL

        public static final int RADIAL
        Radial gives a spotlight effect.
